articles.description: Its Comet Lake predecessor, the 10900K, reached 7.7GHz
articles.content: How fast can Intels new Core i9-11900K processor go? We saw it hit 7GHz already in some early attempts, but now, a professional overclocker has pushed the Rocket Lake flagship to 7.31GHz, a new recor… [+1722 chars]
